## Project Information
- **Project Type**: Next.js Web Application
- **Language**: TypeScript
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS
- **Features**: App Router, ESLint
- **Package Manager**: npm

## Development
Run `npm run dev` to start the development server at http://localhost:3000

## Build
Run `npm run build` to create a production build

## Deploy
This project is ready to deploy on Vercel. Visit https://vercel.com/new to deploy.
